en.name: Dialogues of the Desert Sages
en.passiveDescription: When the wielder performs healing, restore {{8//10//12//14//16}} Energy. This effect can be triggered once every 10s and can occur even when the character is not on the field.

zh.name: 沙中伟贤的对答
zh.passiveDescription: 进行治疗时，恢复{{8//10//12//14//16}}点能量，该效果每10秒至多触发一次，角色处于队伍后台时也能触发。
